mapper.select: select t1.id, t1.username, t1.nickname, t1.password, t1.status, t3.code as roleCode from sys_user t1 left join sys_user_role t2 on t1.id = t2.user_id left join sys_role t3 on t2.role_id = t3.id where t1.deleted = ${@cn.goduck.kl.common.core.constant.GlobalConstant@VALID} and t1.username = #{username}
